model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    This class creates the player object. The parameters of a player such as color, name, etc. is managed by this class.
    Author:
    Team B

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor.

      • Player

        public Player(GameInstance.PlayerColor color,
      String name,
      Config config)
        Creates a player with a specified color, name and configuration.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the player - is linked with the color of the players castles.
        name - The name of the player.
        config - The configuration object to use for this player. This is coming from the GameInstance that is loading this player.
